channel.title: math.MG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.MG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Minimal volume product of three dimensional convex bodies invariant under certain groups of order four
item.description: arXiv:2409.16785v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We give the sharp lower bound of the volume product of three dimensional convex bodies which are invariant under two kinds of discrete subgroups of $O(3)$ of order four. We also characterize the convex bodies with the minimal volume product in each case. This provides new partial results of the non-symmetric version of Mahler's conjecture in the three dimensional case.
item.dc:creator: Hiroshi Iriyeh, Masataka Shibata

item.title: Symmetry results for the area formula in homogeneous groups
item.description: arXiv:2409.16918v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove that if the shape of the metric unit ball in a homogeneous group enjoys a precise symmetry property, then the associated distance yields the standard form of the area formula. The result applies to some classes of smooth and nonsmooth submanifolds. We finally prove the equality between spherical measure and centered Hausdorff measure, under two different geometric conditions on the shape of the metric unit ball.
item.dc:creator: Francesca Corni, Valentino Magnani
